mapper.update: UPDATE USER_SIGNIN SET CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY = CASE date_format( SIGNIN_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d' ) WHEN DATE_SUB( curdate( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) THEN ( CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY + 1 ) WHEN DATE_SUB( curdate( ), INTERVAL 2 DAY ) THEN 1 WHEN curdate( ) THEN CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY END, SIGNIN_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY, t2.* FROM user_signin t1 LEFT JOIN user_info t2 ON t1.USER_ID = t2.USER_ID WHERE t2.USER_FLAG = 0 AND YEARWEEK( date_format( SIGNIN_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) = YEARWEEK( now( ) ) ORDER BY CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY DESC LIMIT 16
SELECT USER_ID, SIGNIN_TIME, CONTINUITY_SIGNIN_DAY FROM user_signin WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
